definition: to turn back/to reverse
contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel
see 轉文|转文[zhuai3 wen2]
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
irreversible
reverse transcription virus/retrovirus
reverse transcriptase

sentences.english: In other words, ageing is not only stoppable but also reversible.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说就是衰老不仅可以阻止，而且可以逆转。

sentences.english: Other studies have suggested that tight control can reverse microalbuminuria.
sentences.chinese: 其他研究都表明了严格控制可以逆转微量尿蛋白。

sentences.english: How can this performance reversal be explained in light of my earlier theoretical discussion?
sentences.chinese: 如何用我前面的理论讨论解释这一性能逆转呢？

sentences.english: The irrevocable trend of the development of the Chinese characters is simplifying.
sentences.chinese: 简化是汉字发展不可逆转的走向。

sentences.english: Diseases can be prevented or reversed by increasing the alkalinity of the terrain
sentences.chinese: 通过增加内环境的碱性，疾病可以被防止或者逆转。

sentences.english: But he said erosion of the U.S. manufacturing base 'is irreversible.
sentences.chinese: 但他说，美国制造业基础的侵蚀是不可逆转的。

sentences.english: And we can go beyond prevention.
sentences.chinese: 除了预防，糖尿病也能逆转。

sentences.english: Recently there has been a welcome reversal of this trend.
sentences.chinese: 近来，这种趋势有了一个令人欢迎的逆转。

sentences.english: Retrotransponson is one of the major parts of rice transposon.
sentences.chinese: 逆转座子是水稻转座因子的一个主要组成部分。

sentences.english: Think of efferent coupling as the inverse of afferent coupling.
sentences.chinese: 可以把传出耦合看作传入耦合的逆转。

sentences.english: A ramping up of asset prices to such a degree that a major reversal or crash is expected.
sentences.chinese: 指资产价格狂涨至预期将会大幅逆转或崩溃的程度。

sentences.english: Quite logically, the marking-up process began to reverse itself.
sentences.chinese: 很自然，这个价格上涨的过程开始逆转。

sentences.english: The intention of ART is to decrease this viral load.
sentences.chinese: 抗逆转录病毒的目的就是降低病毒载量。

sentences.english: Objective To develop effective combination of drug resistance modulators.
sentences.chinese: 目的寻找有效的多药耐药联合逆转剂。

sentences.english: The lightening and thinning of wool product is an irreversible tendency in wool spinning industry of today.
sentences.chinese: 羊毛产品轻薄化是当今毛纺行业不可逆转的趋势。

sentences.english: Lin Dan won the championship in a stunning turnaround.
sentences.chinese: 林丹惊天逆转夺得冠军。

definition: to defeat/to beat
to prevail over/to defeat/to surmount
to score a victory/to prevail over one's opponents
to win by a narrow margin/to barely win/narrow victory
to defeat decisively/to win decisively/great victory/triumph
to make a comeback/(of a doctor's assessment of the gender of a fetus) to turn out to be wrong
to deal the fatal blow (sports, chess etc)/to score the winning point
no match for/cannot beat
to prevail with difficulty
end/conclusion/to come to an end/to terminate (sth)
to reverse (the score)/to pull off a comeback/to take the lead
to suffer a defeat/to fail/to fall behind
an upset (esp. in sports)/unexpected turn of events/to pull off a coup/a breakthrough
victorious/to win/to triumph
to turn defeat into victory (idiom); to turn the tide
to equalize/to level the score/to pull back the advantage
